mapper.select: SELECT ADMIN_NO, EMAIL, PW, NICKNAME, DEL_FL, AUTHORITY, AUTHORITY_NO FROM "ADMIN" JOIN "AUTHORITY" USING(AUTHORITY_NO) WHERE EMAIL = #{adminEmail} AND DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_TEL, M.MEMBER_BIRTHDAY, TO_CHAR(M.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS ENROLL_DATE, M.MEMBER_DEL_FL, COUNT(R.COMMENT_NO) AS COUNT_COMMENT, COUNT(N.REPORT_NO) AS COUNT_REPORT FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN REVIEW R ON M.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN REPORT N ON M.MEMBER_NO = N.ASSAILANT_PK GROUP BY M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_TEL, M.MEMBER_BIRTHDAY, M.ENROLL_DATE, M.MEMBER_DEL_FL ORDER BY M.MEMBER_NO

SELECT T.TRAINER_NO, T.TRAINER_EMAIL, T.TRAINER_NICKNAME, T.SALES, TO_CHAR(T.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS ENROLL_DATE, T.TRAINNER_DEL_FL, T.GENDER, COUNT(B.BOARD_NO) AS COUNT_BOARD_NO, COUNT(R.REPORT_NO) AS COUNT_REPORT_NO FROM TRAINER T LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON B.TRAINER_NO = T.TRAINER_NO LEFT JOIN REPORT R ON R.ASSAILANT_PK = T.TRAINER_NO GROUP BY T.TRAINER_NO, T.TRAINER_EMAIL, T.TRAINER_NICKNAME, T.SALES, T.ENROLL_DATE, T.TRAINNER_DEL_FL, T.GENDER ORDER BY T.TRAINER_NO

SELECT ORDER_NO, ORDER_CLASS_AMOUNT, ORDER_CLASS_NO, TITLE, PAYMENT_DATE FROM "ORDER" O JOIN "BOARD" B ON(O.ORDER_CLASS_NO = B.BOARD_NO) LEFT JOIN "PAYMENT" P USING(ORDER_NO) WHERE ORDER_MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT COMMENT_NO, REVIEW_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REVIEW_WRITE_DATE,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS REVIEW_WRITE_DATE, "NUMBER", R.BOARD_NO, B.CLASS_NO FROM "REVIEW" R JOIN "BOARD" B ON (R.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND REVIEW_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT QUERY_NO, QUERY_DETAIL, TO_CHAR(QUERY_DATE,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS QUERY_DATE, QUERY_TYPE, STATUS FROM "QUERY" WHERE QUERY_PK = #{memberNo}
SELECT REPORT_NO, REPORT_DETAIL, TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS REPORT_DATE, REPORTER_TYPE, ASSAILANT_TYPE, ASSAILANT_PK, STATUS FROM "REPORT" WHERE REPORTER_PK = #{memberNo}
SELECT QUERY_NO, QUERY_DETAIL, QUERY_DATE, QUERY_TYPE, STATUS FROM "QUERY" WHERE QUERY_PK = #{trainerNo}
SELECT REPORT_NO, REPORT_DETAIL, TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS REPORT_DATE, REPORTER_TYPE, ASSAILANT_TYPE, ASSAILANT_PK, STATUS FROM "REPORT" WHERE REPORTER_PK = #{trainerNo}
SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, TO_CHAR(UPLOAD_DATE,'YY"."MM"."DD"."') AS UPLOAD_DATE FROM "BOARD" WHERE TRAINER_NO = #{trainerNo}
SELECT QUALIFICATION_NO, QUALIFICATION, AWARD, CAREER, TO_CAHR(QUALIFICATION_DATE, 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') FROM "QUALIFICATION" WHERE TRAINER_NO = #{trainerNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE "MEMBER" SET MEMBER_DEL_FL = DECODE(MEMBER_DEL_FL, 'Y', 'N', 'Y') WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD" B LEFT JOIN "ORDER" O ON(B.BOARD_NO = O.ORDER_CLASS_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO = '2' AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, PAYMENT, SUM(ORDER_CLASS_AMOUNT) AS GRADE FROM "BOARD" B LEFT JOIN "ORDER" O ON(B.BOARD_NO = O.ORDER_CLASS_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO = '2' AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' GROUP BY BOARD_NO, TITLE, PAYMENT
